CustomField.description: This represents the name of the attribute of the subject to use from the SSO provider. The value thats contained within this attribute will be compared against the value in the field represented in Federation Field field
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This represents the name of the attribute of the subject to use from the SSO provider. The value thats contained within this attribute will be compared against the value in the field represented in Federation Field field
CustomField.label: Subject Attribute
